title: Adress line from a letter.
content:
Hope’s not too hard!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213011404im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_image_4719.jpg)

 [‹ ID Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213011404/http:/typophile.com/node/39928 "Go to previous forum topic") [Fun font, help me figure it out?? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213011404/http:/typophile.com/node/39922 "Go to next forum topic")
author: pgabriel

comments.content:
Here’s a little more of it. Hope it helps.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213011404im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_image2_4642.jpg)

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213011404im_/http:/typophile.com/files/comparison_5942.JPG)

I have tried it and got this result. I don’t know if it’s the exact match. But it’s good enough for me.  
Thank you very much.

I have found this font:  
 [Corporate S Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213011404/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/corporate-s/light/win-ttf/96674/)  
from:  
 [URW++](http://web.archive.org/web/20071213011404/http:/www.urwpp.de/english/home.html)

Thank you!
